title: Why cant we reconnect to champ select?
body: So when i joined a champ select for a normal draft pick, my league crashed. But i noticed that i'm not able to reconnect to the champ select so im forced to wait 5 minutes to queue again just because i cant reconnect to the select screen? That seems pretty stupid to me. Is that just something  that cant be fixed or something? Because if it is possible to be fix why hasn't it been yet?

replies.body:
This is likely tied to a poor connection to the servers that causes your client to not be able to establish a good link to the gameserver. I encourage you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common network misconfigurations that cause this.

Let me know if those steps resolved this.
i dont think it's a bug, they just never implemented it. it's infuriating because it happened to me in my promos.
